item.title: About Us
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[trx_section bg_tint="light" class="accent_top" animation="fadeInUp" dedicated="" align="none" columns="none" pan="" scroll="" scroll_dir="horizontal" scroll_controls="horizontal" font_weight="inherit" top="80" bottom="120"][trx_content animation="none"][trx_title type="2" style="regular" align="center" top="0" bottom="0.85em"]Why Our Barbershop?[/trx_title][trx_columns count="2"][trx_column_item][trx_block][trx_icon icon="icon-male184" font_size="4.5em" align="left" bottom="0.15em" right="0.5em" class="link_color" bg_shape="none" bg_style="custom" font_weight="inherit"]Our barbershop is the territory created purely for males who value premium quality, time and flawless look. You will get a cut of your life and spend great time with your buddies.[/trx_block][trx_block top="0.5em"][trx_icon icon="icon-razor1" font_size="4.5em" align="left" bottom="0.15em" right="0.5em" class="link_color" bg_shape="none" bg_style="custom" font_weight="inherit"]Our services spectrum encompasses many techniques and procedures – from straight razor shaving and hairstyling to beard care and eyebrow grooming. Whether you just need a quick touch, or the whole pack - we'll do that for you![/trx_block][trx_block top="1.5em"][trx_icon icon="icon-male185" font_size="4.5em" align="left" bottom="0.15em" right="0.5em" class="link_color" bg_shape="none" bg_style="custom" font_weight="inherit"]

Our barbershop means a relaxed and easy atmosphere, and always a top quality service for men! Come in and enjoy the conversation and the best haircut you’ve ever had.

[/trx_block][/trx_column_item][trx_column_item][trx_video url="https://vimeo.com/116429405" height="335" autoplay="off" image="http://barber.axiomthemes.com/wp-content/imports/2015/05/barbergallery02.jpg"][/trx_column_item][/trx_columns][/trx_content][/trx_section] [trx_section dedicated="" align="none" columns="none" pan="" scroll="" scroll_dir="horizontal" scroll_controls="horizontal" bg_tint="none" bg_color="#f7f7f7" font_weight="inherit" animation="none"][trx_content animation="none" top="80" bottom="80"][trx_title type="2" style="regular" align="center" font_weight="inherit" icon="inherit" image="none" image_size="small" position="top" bottom="0.5em" animation="none"]Licensed Barbers[/trx_title][trx_team style="1" columns="3" custom="" count="3" offset="0" orderby="date" order="asc" animation="none"][/trx_team][/trx_content][/trx_section][trx_section bg_tint="dark" class="link_color_bgc" dedicated="" align="none" columns="none" pan="" scroll="" scroll_dir="horizontal" scroll_controls="horizontal" font_weight="inherit" animation="none" bg_color="#000000" bg_image="1574" bg_overlay="0.8" top="15"][trx_title type="2" style="regular" align="center" font_weight="inherit" icon="inherit" image="none" image_size="small" position="top" animation="none" bottom="0.5em" top="80"]Testimonials[/trx_title][trx_testimonials controls="yes" interval="7000" align="center" autoheight="" custom="" count="3" offset="0" orderby="date" order="desc" bg_tint="none" bottom="90" animation="none"][/trx_testimonials][/trx_section][trx_section animation="fadeInUp" dedicated="" align="none" columns="none" pan="" scroll="" scroll_dir="horizontal" scroll_controls="horizontal" bg_tint="none" font_weight="inherit" top="80" bottom="80"][trx_content animation="none"][trx_block align="center" width="70%"][trx_title type="2" top="0"]The Best Brands Only[/trx_title]We all know that the best treatment starts with the best ingredients. item.content:encoded:
[trx_section box="yes" dedicated="no" scroll="no" bottom="small"][trx_content animation="none" top="90" bottom="100"][trx_title type="2" top="large" bottom="mini" align="center"]Support Policy[/trx_title][trx_columns count="2"][trx_column_item][trx_list style="ul"][trx_list_item]To get a pre-purchase advice, you may post in the theme's forum[trx_br clear="both"][trx_br clear="both"][/trx_list_item][trx_list_item]To get a response more promptly, you are recommended to use our Ticket-system[trx_br clear="both"][trx_br clear="both"][/trx_list_item][trx_list_item]We try to answer your questions within 1-10 hours. However, if any delay occurs it doesn't mean that we forgot about you. Some of the issues require testing and analyzing, so we could help you more profoundly.[trx_br clear="both"][trx_br clear="both"][/trx_list_item][/trx_list][/trx_column_item][trx_column_item][trx_list style="ul"][trx_list_item]Please, note We do not support queries if you do not have a purchase code.[trx_br clear="both"][trx_br clear="both"][/trx_list_item][trx_list_item]Item support does not include:[/trx_list_item][trx_br clear="both"][trx_br clear="both"][/trx_list][/trx_column_item][/trx_columns][/trx_content][/trx_section][trx_section dedicated="no" scroll="no" bg_color="#f7f7f7" box="yes"][trx_content animation="none" top="90" bottom="100"][trx_title type="2" align="center" top="big"]How to use our Support System[/trx_title]

Axiom technical support is always there to assist their users with all their technical questions regarding Axiom products. [trx_columns count="2" bottom="middle"][trx_column_item align="center"][trx_image url="http://barber.axiomthemes.com/wp-content/imports/2015/05/laptop.png" link="off" shape="square" increment="no"][/trx_column_item][trx_column_item][trx_list style="ol"][trx_list_item]In the 'Item Details' there is a clickable banner 'Support Sys' using which you are getting into tickets.[trx_br clear="both"][trx_br clear="both"][/trx_list_item][trx_list_item icon="inherit"]Or you may simply use this link axiom.ticksy.com[trx_br clear="both"][trx_br clear="both"][/trx_list_item][trx_list_item]Enter your purchase key and register in the system[trx_br clear="both"][trx_br clear="both"][/trx_list_item][trx_list_item]To avoid confusing, please use for Support System your own ThemeForest login[trx_br clear="both"][trx_br clear="both"][/trx_list_item][trx_list_item]Fill out the ticket form[trx_br clear="both"][trx_br clear="both"][/trx_list_item][/trx_list][/trx_column_item][/trx_columns][/trx_content][/trx_section][trx_section box="yes" dedicated="no" scroll="no"][trx_content animation="none" top="90" top="small"][trx_list_item]Open the 'downloads' tab in your account[trx_br clear="both"][trx_br clear="both"][/trx_list_item][trx_list_item]Find our theme in the list of products[trx_br clear="both"][trx_br clear="both"][/trx_list_item][trx_list_item]Click 'download' button, and in the drop down menu select 'license sertificate & purchase code'[trx_br clear="both"][trx_br item.title: Thank from Anderson
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: These guys are always there when I need to have my hair cut or a beard trim. They actually know what they are doing.

item.title: From Marcus Smith
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: These barbers really took the time with my cut and I got a beard trim as well. They had refreshments in a cooler while you wait, which I waited for about 5 minutes even though it was "busy."

item.title: From Matt Jefferson
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: I have been going to this Barbershop since moving here and wouldn't dream of going anywhere else. Superb haircut and great staff.

item.title: Edwin Wood
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[trx_content animation="none"][trx_title type="2" style="regular" align="center" font_weight="inherit" icon="inherit" image="none" image_size="small" position="top" animation="none" bottom="0.5em"]About Barber[/trx_title]

Our barbers will make you look your best by combining good old traditional haircuts and straight razor shaves with modern techniques

[trx_block align="left" columns="1_4" font_weight="inherit" animation="none"][trx_team style="1" custom="yes" columns="1"][trx_team_item user="none" member="none" name="Edwin Wood" position="Barber" photo="http://barber.axiomthemes.com/wp-content/imports/2015/05/team_1.jpg" link="#" socials="facebook=#|gplus=#|twitter=#" animation="none"][/trx_team_item][/trx_team][/trx_block][trx_block dedicated="" align="right" columns="5_7" scroll_dir="horizontal" bg_tint="none" font_weight="inherit" animation="none" pan="" scroll="" scroll_controls="horizontal"][trx_title type="4" style="regular" align="none" font_weight="inherit" icon="inherit" image="none" image_size="small" position="top" animation="none"]Edwin Wood[/trx_title]Edwin completed an accredited training program offered through a barber and cosmetology school. He has high school diploma and certificate of completion of an accredited barber training program of the National Accrediting Commission of Cosmetology Arts and Sciences. Edwin is one of the most famous and best (as well as the highest paid) barbers in the country. He regularly holds master classes and workshops for barbers both in town and abroad. He is an author of numerous articles on beard/mustache styling in many famous magazines.[trx_section dedicated="" align="left" columns="1_2" pan="" scroll="" scroll_dir="horizontal" scroll_controls="horizontal" bg_tint="none" font_weight="inherit" animation="none"][trx_skills max_value="100" type="bar" layout="rows" dir="horizontal" style="1" columns="3" align="none" animation="none" top="30"][trx_skills_item title="Hair Cut" value="100%" color="#bf9456" style="1"][/trx_skills_item][trx_skills_item title="Shaving" value="85%" color="#bf9456" style="1"][/trx_skills_item][trx_skills_item title="Beard Trimming" value="75%" color="#bf9456" style="1"][/trx_skills_item][/trx_skills][/trx_section][/trx_block][trx_section dedicated="" align="center" columns="none" pan="" scroll="" scroll_dir="horizontal" scroll_controls="horizontal" bg_tint="none" font_weight="inherit" animation="none"][trx_button type="square" style="filled" size="medium" icon="icon-plus-3" bg_style="custom" align="none" link="http://barber.axiomthemes.com/book/" popup="" animation="none" top="20"]make an appoinment[/trx_button][/trx_section][/trx_content][trx_content animation="none"][trx_title type="2" style="regular" align="center" font_weight="inherit" icon="inherit" image="none" image_size="small" position="top" animation="none" bottom="0.5em" top="25"]Professional Certification[/trx_title]

He is an author of numerous articles on beard/mustache styling in many famous magazines.[trx_section dedicated="" align="left" columns="1_2" pan="" scroll="" scroll_dir="horizontal" scroll_controls="horizontal" bg_tint="none" font_weight="inherit" animation="none"][trx_skills max_value="100" type="bar" layout="rows" dir="horizontal" style="1" columns="3" align="none" animation="none" top="30"][trx_skills_item title="Hair Cut" value="100%" color="#bf9456" style="1"][/trx_skills_item][trx_skills_item title="Shaving" value="85%" color="#bf9456" style="1"][/trx_skills_item][trx_skills_item title="Beard Trimming" value="75%" color="#bf9456" style="1"][/trx_skills_item][/trx_skills][/trx_section][/trx_block][trx_section dedicated="" align="center" columns="none" pan="" scroll="" scroll_dir="horizontal" scroll_controls="horizontal" bg_tint="none" font_weight="inherit" animation="none"][trx_button type="square" style="filled" size="medium" icon="icon-plus-3" bg_style="custom" align="none" link="http://barber.axiomthemes.com/book/" popup="" animation="none" top="20"]make an appoinment[/trx_button][/trx_section][/trx_content][trx_content animation="none"][trx_title type="2" style="regular" align="center" font_weight="inherit" icon="inherit" image="none" image_size="small" position="top" animation="none" bottom="0.5em" top="25"]Professional Certification[/trx_title]
